source:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Man-eating bears stalk the ice fields, and Iliette has a mind to turn the tables, but not quite as one would expect.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
キャンプ・ブロークングラスのイリエットは、気合が入っているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_TODO_00<tab>Place sedative-laced venison at the designated locations.
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_000<tab>Just the person I was hoping to see! Might I interest you in a little hunting?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_000おや、いいところに来てくれた。
ちょいと付き合ってくれないかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_001<tab>It's bears I'm after. If you've never tried their meat, I'd thoroughly recommend it! They're far from the easiest of prey, though I daresay you've faced much worse.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_001食料を確保するために、
このあたりでを狩ろうと思うんだ。
そこで、狩りの腕も一流であろう貴方に頼みたいことがある。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_002<tab>If you're game, here's the plan: first, we lure them out with this deer meat, which is also laced with sleeping potion. Then, it's a simple matter of walking over and offing them in the manner of your choosing. What could be simpler?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_002まず、アンテロープのスネ肉に、薬を仕込んだ、
「」を数箇所に設置したいと思う。
それを食べて眠った状態のところを、一突きで倒すのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_003<tab>Here's three ample servings of prime venison. Be sure to let the concoction take effect before swooping in to claim your prize!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_003貴方には「」を置いてきてほしいんだ。
ホレア・カンピ付近の、3箇所ほどに仕掛けてくれれば大丈夫だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_004<tab>You'd do well to stay alert while lying in wait. Wouldn't want any bears sneaking up from behind, would you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_004「」を置いてきてほしいんだ。
ホレア・カンピ付近の、3箇所ほどに仕掛けてくれれば大丈夫だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_010<tab>I see you are still in possession of a full set of limbs, which can only mean the hunt was a success! Truth be told, I heard from others in the field that the bear you encountered was rather more...lively than we'd anticipated. And a fair bit bigger.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_010あぁ、無事に戻ってきてくれて良かった！
別働隊から、肉を仕掛けていたら、
に襲われたと聞いて、心配していたんだよ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_011<tab>What!? You felled that brute all by yourself?
target: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_011<tab>ひ、ひとりで<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F229A101 /var>を倒したって！？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_012<tab>Most impressive... Though it would appear that the sleeping potion provided by Lord Emmanellain was considerably less effective than he'd led us to believe...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_012実は、例の肉に仕込んだ「睡眠の劇毒薬」は、
エマネラン卿が用意してくれたものなのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_013<tab>As he tells it, he adopted this approach after incurring the wrath of his lord father for his inability to master more...sporting methods. He spoke of his exploits with some pride, despite the tales hardly painting him in a favorable light.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_013ほら、貴族社会には狩猟文化があるだろう？
彼もしばしば参加していたそうなんだが、
楽に獲物を仕留めたくて、例の罠を考えたそうでね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_014<tab>Still, in our present situation, we must forgo the thrill of the hunt and select the means that present the surest route to success, underhanded though they may be.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_014狩猟は軍事訓練も兼ねたものだったため、
先代フォルタン伯爵からは、相当怒られたらしい。
それを自慢げに語っていたが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_015<tab>Regrettably, the bears of this region are entirely immune to the formula...or perhaps there was something wrong with it to begin with. In any case, no harm done, eh? To you, I mean, not the bears. Obviously.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC014_04223_ILIETTE_000_015いやはや、英雄殿には、
下手な小細工など不要だったということだな。
ともかく付き合ってくれて、ありがとう、これを受け取ってくれ。
